about_the_game:
The Last Issue is an exhilarating adventure puzzle game where you embark on a thrilling quest as one of four vibrant and unique characters, all named Larkin. United by a singular mission—which is to collect the elusive Chasing Angels comic book series—your ultimate goal is to track down all ten issues and uncover the breathtaking, heart-stopping conclusion of the Chasing Angels comic book series.

Your journey will span the globe, taking you to bustling cities, shadowy forests, perilous dungeons, and twisting, labyrinthine caves. Each location is brimming with intricate puzzles that will test your intellect and push you to your limits. Along the way, you’ll encounter strange allies, face unimaginable challenges, and delve deeper into a mystery that grows ever more complex.

The true question, however, is this: will the trials and dangers of your adventure be worth it when you finally hold The Last Issue in your hands? Only you can decide if the perilous quest for the Chasing Angels series is a risk worth taking.

name: The Last Issue: Chasing Angels
short_description: Embark on an exciting quest to track down all 10 issues of the beloved comic book series Chasing Angels. As you collect each issue, dive into their pages and uncover the thrilling conclusion of this captivating series. Will you piece together the mystery and reveal the final secrets of the series?
